thread.title: New Tax Law Could Cut Giving to Colleges

author: Jillian Berman
title: New Tax Law Could Cut Giving to Colleges
text:
Colleges hauled in record donations last year, but the new tax law could affect alumni’s interest in donating to their alma mater.
Several provisions in the new tax law “suggest Congress is looking to nonprofit institutions in ways they never have before” as a source of revenue, says Peter Fissinger, chief executive of Campbell & Co., a consulting firm for nonprofits.
The...
